14197006566.text: I'm in Minneapolis for a show. Couldn't figure out why I've felt so aroused all day; then I realized that Prince lives here.
14197006566.name: ConanOBrien

14107227935.text: I’m in KC. I like my BBQ like I like my women, HOT. Also, rubbed with Molasses, Coffee Grounds and Cayenne.
14107227935.name: ConanOBrien

14061304907.text: I just realized that if Chazz Palminteri married Jason Mraz, it would mean... they loved each other very much.
14061304907.name: ConanOBrien

14002165737.text: If you miss seeing me late at night, tickets are now available for an 11:35pm show in Atlantic City. Go here: http://www.theborgata.com
14002165737.name: ConanOBrien

13934630307.text: I'm performing tonight in Dallas. Interesting thing about this town; no one really dresses like this. http://twitpic.com/1ni7ob
13934630307.name: ConanOBrien

13862317514.text: I've decided to start tweeting about major world events, so I just read four newspapers. Man, is it me or can Garfield be a real dick?
13862317514.name: ConanOBrien

13803777561.text: I'm a simple man. I start every day with a cup of joe, the morning paper, and a lavender Pan-Asiatic body scrub from my man-servant, Lobo.
13803777561.name: ConanOBrien

13740363017.text: Twitter exploded today! I guess my dream of a world where Twitter runs our stock market, phones, and nuclear defense is still a ways off.
13740363017.name: ConanOBrien

13687855905.text: Hey Mom, Happy Mother's Day! Hey Hallmark, screw you!
13687855905.name: ConanOBrien

13631062967.text: If it ever says I’m following more than one person, I’ve been hacked. I’m a completely monogamous Twitterer—I only follow Sarah Killen.
13631062967.name: ConanOBrien

13568677197.text: I got this bruise stage diving. It's called "Giving 100%." It's also called ”Total lack of depth perception.” http://twitpic.com/1lunvn
13568677197.name: ConanOBrien

13507461203.text: On my bunk in the Tour Bus, eating Doritos and watching Team America.  Me happy. http://twitpic.com/1llcrp
13507461203.name: ConanOBrien

13437443725.text: I'm in San Jose and I'm going to visit Google.  If you look up 'Google' on Google from Google, you see the face of God.
13437443725.name: ConanOBrien

13393925232.text: I'm performing tonight at a dinner theater in Reno. Who says my career is in trouble? http://twitpic.com/1l342b
13393925232.name: ConanOBrien

13324177564.text: Through the desert on my way to Reno, I passed an establishment called "Shady Ladies". I think it's either a brothel or a tree nursery.
13324177564.name: ConanOBrien

13249898520.text: Hey kids, check me out on '60 Minutes' tonight. Watch for the part of the interview where I start crying and admit to mail fraud.
13249898520.name: ConanOBrien

13205842005.text: I'm in Vegas - and what happens in Vegas stays in Vegas. Unless it's a superflu pandemic that spreads thru the nation causing chaos & panic.
13205842005.name: ConanOBrien

13146245563.text: I came in second to Lady Gaga in the Artist's category of the Time 100. Once again, I'm penalized for not wearing a bra that shoots fire.
13146245563.name: ConanOBrien

13084403377.text: Today my tour takes me to San Diego. San Diego is Spanish for "You Can Attend College Classes Without a Shirt."
13084403377.name: ConanOBrien

13022883170.text: I just ran into Ellen DeGeneres on the Warner Bros lot and we played ping pong.  I think she's really into me.
13022883170.name: ConanOBrien

12962037098.text: Who would invest in Goldman Sachs mortgage investments? I played it safe and bought Greek bonds and magic beans.
12962037098.name: ConanOBrien

12896157779.text: We've added a show in Michigan. Finally I get to perform in a state shaped like a fat guy's hand. For tix go here: http://breslincenter.com
12896157779.name: ConanOBrien

12844239368.text: Jim Carrey rudely interrupted my power ballad last night. How did he get past security in a Superman outfit? Look here: http://teamcoco.com
12844239368.name: ConanOBrien

12797983035.text: I'm doing my live show tonight from the Universal lot where I taped The Tonight Show. So if a shot rings out, tell my wife I loved her.
12797983035.name: ConanOBrien

12717773663.text: I'm sending a tweet from inside Twitter HQ. I'll bet those hot girls in high school wish they had slept with me now.
12717773663.name: ConanOBrien

12671268127.text: Doing a show in San Francisco. This is a chair in my dressing room. I'm not kidding. http://twitpic.com/1hmrl6
12671268127.name: ConanOBrien

12605894442.text: Today is my first real day off from touring. I'm home enjoying what my agent tells me is my family.
12605894442.name: ConanOBrien

12536051804.text: Eddie Vedder's set at my show in Seattle last night melted my eyeballs. Seriously, I'm going to sue Eddie for boiling my ocular-jelly.
12536051804.name: ConanOBrien

12492942003.text: It took a trip to the Seattle Fish Market to learn my skin color is "Halibut White." http://yfrog.com/1chalibutwhite1j
12492942003.name: ConanOBrien

12420698697.text:
Hayley Mills, Kourtney Kardashian, Melissa Joan Hart and I were all
born on today's date. Coincidence? Or the new cast of Bad Girl's Club?
12420698697.name: ConanOBrien

12363449726.text: I'm performing at the River Cree Casino just before Don Rickles.  My comedy life is now complete.
12363449726.name: ConanOBrien

12310342352.text: I just gave my waitress, Bambi, tickets to tonight's show in Spokane. Do I still have to tip her? http://twitpic.com/1g3u42
12310342352.name: ConanOBrien

12241719628.text: Taxes are due today and I'm in Canada.  Just try to catch me, Uncle Sam!
12241719628.name: ConanOBrien

12179863243.text: Welcome to the new http://teamcoco.com.  Less predators than Craigslist, more predators than Facebook.
12179863243.name: ConanOBrien

12122765475.text: I'm in Vancouver for my second show. Thought I'd stir up some controversy by wearing my hat that says "Canada." http://twitpic.com/1fdmy7
12122765475.name: ConanOBrien

12055203405.text: The good news: I will be doing a show on TBS starting in November! The bad news: I'll be playing Rudy on the all new Cosby Show.
12055203405.name: ConanOBrien

12021339256.text: http://twitpic.com/1ezvfa - I'm in Eugene, OR and my room faces the theater where I debut tomorrow. The mob outside is in a frenzy.
12021339256.name: ConanOBrien

11954303683.text: Watching the Masters. I don't know how Matteo Manassero can play under this intense media scrutiny.
11954303683.name: ConanOBrien

11895987544.text: http://twitpic.com/1ece6n - I traced my tour route on a map. I see a turtle sexually attacking a horse smoking a cigarette.
11895987544.name: ConanOBrien

11838082885.text: 4 days to my first show.  Eugene Oregon… Brace yourself for a towering tsunami of dry, self-deprecating humor.
11838082885.name: ConanOBrien

11783156117.text: 5 days to the opening of my tour. I don't want to over-hype this thing, but attendance will cure all known diseases.
11783156117.name: ConanOBrien

11715673972.text: Apologies to Duke fans, but I really wanted Butler to win so I could write “The Butler Did It.”
11715673972.name: ConanOBrien

11656639596.text: @justinbieber is tweeting about me again. He's obsessed! Which new song is about me, beebz? If it's "Eenie Meenie", we have a problem.
11656639596.name: ConanOBrien

11592593872.text: I just celebrated the end of Lent by eating 22 sleeves of Peeps. My religion rocks!
11592593872.name: ConanOBrien

11551686333.text: Just got the new iPad. This amazing device has already revolutionized the way I use a calculator.
11551686333.name: ConanOBrien

11499875305.text: http://twitpic.com/1cozv2 - In honor of Good Friday, I’ve hired a writer who looks like Jesus with a perm.
11499875305.name: ConanOBrien

11440034419.text: Man, I am so tired. APRIL FOOL'S!  I'm NOT tired.  (I'm kind of tired)
11440034419.name: ConanOBrien

11379172083.text: I'm confused by the new census form.  There's no box for "Sickly White."
11379172083.name: ConanOBrien

11333482720.text: http://twitpic.com/1c1ulw - For the tour, I'm borrowing No Doubt's road cases.  Wait until you hear my cover of "Just a girl".
11333482720.name: ConanOBrien

11322526834.text: Night of #140Tweets is out now - all proceeds go to Haiti: www.itunes.com/140tweets. Today's asinine, pointless tweet of the day to come.
11322526834.name: ConanOBrien

11263416712.text:
Jewish fun fact: If you celebrate Passover on top of an overpass, you
go back in time.
11263416712.name: ConanOBrien

11213732622.text: And the Lord said "On the 7th day thou shall not tweet."  And he did not.  And it was good.
11213732622.name: ConanOBrien

11116409183.text: Found out today that you're supposed to urinate on a jellyfish sting, NOT a jellyroll stain. Sorry, fat stranger.
11116409183.name: ConanOBrien

11050544958.text: http://twitpic.com/1avdlj - This is down the street from where we're rehearsing. I guess nothing sells liquor like a maniacal circus clown.
11050544958.name: ConanOBrien

11003102119.text: http://twitpic.com/1ap96p - This is a chord I’ll play on my new tour. It’s a chord only I can make. It blew Slash’s mind.
11003102119.name: ConanOBrien

10947239437.text: I’m worried health care has pushed my Tour out of the headlines. I’m also worried my anti-delusion pills are wearing off. Need more pills.
10947239437.name: ConanOBrien

10888677133.text: Damn! Bieber revealed that I'm opening for him with a Whitney medley. It was supposed to be a surprise. Advantage: Bieber.
10888677133.name: ConanOBrien

10811038755.text: As Bieber sleeps, I grow stronger. Sleep, Bieber. Sleep.
10811038755.name: ConanOBrien

10783127822.text: I've added shows in Atlantic City and Vegas. Bieber plays Houston tomorrow. We circle each other like cobras.
10783127822.name: ConanOBrien

10740551523.text: I just learned that retweets of my Bieber tweet mentioning Bieber actually help Bieber. Bieber, you're a worthy foe. Bieber.
10740551523.name: ConanOBrien

10739093126.text: Sweet victory! I'm now trending higher than my twitter nemesis, Justin Bieber. Who's the tween heartthrob now?
10739093126.name: ConanOBrien

10737153520.text: Want to see an insecure celebrity avoid eye contact?  Meet me courtesy of Amex: http://bit.ly/bEUqsh.
10737153520.name: ConanOBrien

10687278627.text: Are you a fan of up close awkwardness? If so, win a chance to meet me courtesy of @americanexpress. Details tomorrow. Good luck, dad.
10687278627.name: ConanOBrien

10639819561.text: There's some concern about my thumbnail from the last tweet. I injured the nail bed years ago and it never healed. Now you know my shame.
10639819561.name: ConanOBrien

10639169853.text: http://twitpic.com/19765a - Behold! My traditional St. Patrick's Day feast: 7 Guinness, frozen asparagus soup, and 2 pieces of spearmint gum
10639169853.name: ConanOBrien

10585931824.text: Hey sports fans, here's my NCAA pick: bet it all on the Savannah College of Art & Design.  Go Fighting Acrylics!
10585931824.name: ConanOBrien

10531672717.text: I just punched what I thought was a paparazzi with a long lens. It was an old man with a wheat bread sub. Sorry.
10531672717.name: ConanOBrien

10486119328.text: Remember everyone -- tonight at eleven set your clocks two hours back.  Then at 2 am, a half hour forward.  You're welcome.
10486119328.name: ConanOBrien

10441677957.text: Today I began my special tour diet:  waffle batter, no veggies, and massive amounts of German blood sausage.
10441677957.name: ConanOBrien

10391008763.text: Tour preparations have begun. First step: Groupie auditions at Randy's Donuts off the 405 fwy. Knock twice on the white minivan.
10391008763.name: ConanOBrien

10335499646.text: Good news: Just added second shows in San Francisco, Seattle, Vancouver, and LA.  Bad news: Still no show in Guam.
10335499646.name: ConanOBrien

10332149100.text: Hey everybody!  We just added a second night in Boston. I did this so my parents could come. And one of my brothers.
10332149100.name: ConanOBrien

10329450150.text: We are now adding a second show in both NYC & Chicago. For that second show, I'll be doing all Liza Minnelli songs.
10329450150.name: ConanOBrien

10327747292.text: Alert! Teamcoco.com is jammed with too much traffic. If you can't get on, go to http://ticketmaster.com to buy your tickets. See you soon.
10327747292.name: ConanOBrien

10326418664.text: Hey Internet: I'm headed to your town on a half-assed comedy & music tour. Go to http://TeamCoco.com for tix. I repeat: It's half-assed.
10326418664.name: ConanOBrien

10296187413.text: OMG! My pal Sarah got bumped from Larry King for something called "Breaking News". Has the whole world gone insane?!
10296187413.name: ConanOBrien

10240690553.text: http://twitpic.com/17lx53 - I no longer have health care. Could someone show this to a dermatologist and get back to me?
10240690553.name: ConanOBrien

10179231458.text: If I had a show, I'd tweet about which Oscar winner is coming on tonight.  Instead, here's my favorite frozen vegetable: Peas!
10179231458.name: ConanOBrien

10132294743.text:
Hey gang! Look for me at the Oscars tonight. I'll be in the parking
lot, wearing my prom tux and listening on the radio.
10132294743.name: ConanOBrien

10088866239.text: Sarah likes Twizzlers and craves cantaloupe. I like Raisinets, but melon feels creepy in my mouth. Twitter pals 4 eva! :)
10088866239.name: ConanOBrien

10041591698.text: I've decided to follow someone at random.  She likes peanut butter and gummy dinosaurs. Sarah Killen, your life is about to change.
10041591698.name: ConanOBrien

9982743159.text: This morning I applied for a job at Home Depot, but they couldn’t find an apron big enough to fit over my head. Tomorrow: Staples.
9982743159.name: ConanOBrien

9937600928.text:
I just had the fries at the McDonald's in Culver City near the
Lady Foot Locker. SO AWESOME. If you can get there, ORDER
THOSE FRIES.
9937600928.name: ConanOBrien

9889419456.text: http://twitpic.com/1695g1 - This is how many people it took to write today's tweet: "Jumbo" shrimp?  WTF!!
9889419456.name: ConanOBrien

9840834656.text: If anyone's curious what I look like with a beard, it's this ?:^(0)  Coincidentally, that's also my ATM pin number.
9840834656.name: ConanOBrien

9789454093.text: This is only my 5th tweet and I’m already exhausted. My God, how does Ashton do it?
9789454093.name: ConanOBrien

9743435141.text: http://twitpic.com/15ox1s - Good news! I can now spend quality time with my vintage '92 Ford Taurus. Bad news - I left yogurt in the trunk.
9743435141.name: ConanOBrien

9693694076.text: Today I connected all the freckles on my arm with a Sharpie.  It spells out RIKSHAZ9LIRK. Clearly I am The Chosen One.
9693694076.name: ConanOBrien

9642567138.text: This morning I watched Remington Steele while eating Sugar Smacks out of a salad bowl. I was naked.
9642567138.name: ConanOBrien

9596834783.text: Today I interviewed a squirrel in my backyard and then threw to commercial.  Somebody help me.
9596834783.name: ConanOBrien
